Interface SettingsService

All Superinterfaces:
Service
All Known Subinterfaces:
SettingsServiceLocal
All Known Implementing Classes:

public interface SettingsService
extends Service

Service interface for application settings handling

Author:
luis

importFromXml

java.util.List<?> importFromXml(java.lang.String xml,
                                java.util.Collection<Setting.Type> types)
Import settings from the given xml string. The expected format is: 
 <cyclos-settings>
     <settings type="...">
         <setting name="...">
             value
         </setting>
         <setting name="...">
             value
         </setting>
     </settings;>
     <settings type="...">
         <setting name="...">
             value
         </setting>
         <setting name="...">
             value
         </setting>
         <setting name="...">
             value
         </setting>
     </settings;>
 </cyclos-settings>

Parameters:
types - type of settings to import
